summary: Implements an end-to-end neural text-to-speech system that combines a FastSpeech2 acoustic model with a Conformer encoder for mel-spectrogram prediction and a HiFi-GAN vocoder for high-fidelity waveform generation.
business_intent: Enable applications such as virtual assistants, audiobooks, navigation prompts, and other services to generate natural-sounding speech from text quickly and with high audio quality.
